,146 14,124 12,364 Nov 1,785 1,069 3,358 2,633 10,713 9,717 15,856 13,419 Dec 2,039 1,606 3,644 2,986 14,265 13,041 19,948 17,633 Total 1943 22,389 18,518 35,012 31,206 112,193 104,694 169,594 154,418 1944 Jan 4,720 3,811 4,933 4,248 19,339 18,230 28,992 26,289 Feb 3,981 2,380 4,065 2,804 12,522 11,468 20,568 16,652 Mar 5,996 4,202 4,141 3,437 14,661 13,413 24,798 21,052 Apr 10,182 8,084 4,153 3,390 16,310 14,908 30,645 26,382 May 14,432 11,584 7,028 5,787 21,079 19,652 42,539 37,023 Jun 11,761 10,001 5,420 4,777 Jul 12,642 10,825 5,295 4,447 16,766 15,568 16,050 14,768 33,947 30,346 33,987 30,040 Aug 12,194 10,760 6,802 5,661 18,972 17,538 37,968 33,959 Sep 10,056 8,509 5,002 4,152 11,301 10,467 26,359 23,128 Oct 9,567 6,037 3,477 2,382 9,563 8,601 22,607 17,020 Nov 9,259 6,955 4,811 3,623 11,985 10,776 26,055 21,354 Dec Total 1944 114,840 90,383 10,050 7,235 3,317 2,522 14,980 13,605 28,347 23,362 58,444 47,230 183,528 168,994 356,812 306,607 1945 Jan 4,002 2,918 2,947 2,202 9,965 9,219 16,914 14,339 Feb 13,444 10,748 3,998 2,961 13,906 12,433 31,348 26,142 Mar 14,939 12,737 4,971 4,056 15,498 14,583 35,408 31,376 Apr 15,846 11,771 6,752 5,560 18,897 17,567 41,495 34,898 May 42 36 59 51 545 502 Total 1945 48,273 38,210 18,727 14,830 58,811 54,304 646 125,811 589 107,344 Grand Total 187,410 147,111 113,221 93,266 358,882 327,992 659,513 568,369 *Effective sortie figures are for Jan 1943 to May 1945.   ## p. 640 (#664) ############################################    ## p. 641 (#665) ############################################  European Theater of Operations Bombing, Escort Strafing Recon Other* Total Appendix 15 Fighter Sorties Flown against Germany January 1943 to May 1945 Mediterranean Theater of Operations Bombing, Escort Strafing Recon Other* Total 1943 Jan 429 429 1,352 286 186 876 2,700 Feb 450 450 1,093 350 312 266 2,021 Mar 608 608 2,238 505 68 1,698 4,509 Apr 8 8 524 540 3,433 2,063 388 3,089 8,973 May 384 1,836 2,220 2,889 2,393 204 2,803 8,289 Jun 169 1,
